assessmentQuestionVersion.name: FSC_FF_InvestmentDependence
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: How dependent are you on the income produced by the portfolio to satisfy your investment needs?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Not dependent. I have other income sources. Minimally dependent. I have other income sources but income generated from the portfolio is helpful. Moderately dependent. I rely somewhat on the income generated from the portfolio. Considerably dependent. I rely heavily on the income generated from the portfolio.
